channel.title: Cars Ella on Writing by Harper Reed
channel.description: Recent content in Cars Ella on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: youth of today
item.description: so today.. I didn’t get up at the time I was supposed to. I mean I wasn’t really late. but I had planned to get up and do something. I don’t know what.. but I am sure there was something.so the other day.. cole came over and was building a gigantic slot car track. it was increidble. we worked together and now it rules. check it out here.. my ebay addiction has paid off finally.
